PHAXIO_CALLBACK_TOKEN.description: Your Phaxio Callback token (found in Webhooks Settings)

SMTP_HOST.description: SMTP host for outgoing email (for failure alerts)

SMTP_USER.description: SMTP username for outgoing email (for failure alerts)

SMTP_PASSWORD.description: SMTP password for outgoing email (for failure alerts)

SMTP_TLS.description: Should use TLS on outgoing email? (true or blank)

FROM_EMAIL.description: The From address for any outgoing email. Ensure this is a valid email address.

ADMIN_EMAIL.description: The email address used by the Administrator to log in.

DOMAIN_URL.description: The domain this application will be deployed to. If you're not using a custom domain this will be 'https://YOURAPPNAMEHERE.herokuapp.com'.

LOGO_URL.description: A link to your corporate logo. This can be edited by the Admin later.
